snippet: Europol, the European police agency, said Wednesday that it had dismantled a cybercrime organization led by Russians who extorted millions of euros from online users by persuading them to pay spurious police fines for abusive Internet use.
abstract: Europol, the European police agency, said Wednesday that it had dismantled a cybercrime organization led by Russians who extorted millions of euros from online users by persuading them to pay spurious police fines for abusive Internet use.
